general.questionHeadline: Which company data do I need to add in the registration
general.question: (General) Question
general.answer: For the company registration to catena-x, the legal company data are needed. Please add the Headquarter information inside the given fields. If you already have a BPN (Business Partner Number) available you can easily add the BPN inside the search field and we will pre-fill your company data automatically.

invitePeople.questionHeadline: What happens with my added company data?
invitePeople.question: (General) Question
invitePeople.answer: Your company data are used for the registration to catena-x and to create (if not yet existing) a Golden Record data set of your company HQ. This will enable the business partner number creation.

uploadDocuments.questionHeadline: What if my company doesnt have a postal code?
uploadDocuments.question: (General) Question
uploadDocuments.answer: If you dont have a postal code, don't worry, just keep the field empty.

registrationWorkflow.questionHeadline: I am not able to finish the registration right away - what shall/can I do?
registrationWorkflow.question: (General) Question
registrationWorkflow.answer: Thats not a problem. With your user login you can logout and login again later. You current state of the registration will be saved and you can finish the steps as soon as you re-join.
